oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Global Derivation of the Fluctuation Determinant from Group Property of Time Evolution
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kleinert, H.
Bossche, B. Van den
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Van Vleck-Pauli-Morette fluctuation determinant is derived from the global group property of the time evolution amplitude in a continuous formulation of path integrals.
Comment: Author Information under http://www.physik.fu-berlin.de/~kleinert/institution.html . Latest update of paper also at http://www.physik.fu-berlin.de/~kleinert/301
